datasets.name: 2d9fe698
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH cols AS (
  SELECT
    table_schema,
    table_name,
    column_name
  FROM system.information_schema.columns
  WHERE table_catalog = :inv_catalog_name
    AND column_name IN (:error_col_name, :warn_col_name)
)
SELECT
  table_schema AS inv_data_schema,
  lower(table_name) AS q_table_name
FROM cols
GROUP BY table_schema, table_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT column_name) = 2          -- has both error & warn
ORDER BY inv_data_schema, q_table_name;

datasets.name: 5756501d
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
/* --title 'Error and Warning Types Breakdown' */
WITH error_types AS (
    SELECT
        'Error' AS category,
        error_struct.name AS type,
        COUNT(*) AS count
    FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name)) exploded_errors AS error_struct
    WHERE (:error_col_name) IS NOT NULL and IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min and :date_range.max
    GROUP BY error_struct.name
),
warning_types AS (
    SELECT
        'Warning' AS category,
        warning_struct.name AS type,
        COUNT(*) AS count
    FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name))
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name)) exploded_warnings AS warning_struct
    WHERE :warn_col_name IS NOT NULL and IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min and :date_range.max
    GROUP BY warning_struct.name
),
combined AS (
    SELECT * FROM error_types
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM warning_types
),
total AS (
    SELECT SUM(count) AS total_count FROM combined
)
SELECT
    category,
    type,
    count,
    ROUND((count * 100.0) / total.total_count, 2) AS percentage
FROM combined, total
ORDER BY category, count DESC;

SET use_cached_result = false;
SELECT
  column_name as dt_col_name
FROM system.information_schema.columns

table_catalog=:inv_catalog_name and table_schema=:inv_schema_name and table_name=:q_table_name and (lower(columns.data_type)='date' or lower(columns.data_type)='timestamp')

datasets.name: cd5fd6f2
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH all_dates AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) as data_date_col
  FROM
    IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
  WHERE
    IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
),
all_checks AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    err.name AS check_name
  FROM
    IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name)) AS err
    where IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min and :date_range.max
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT
    warn.name AS check_name
  FROM
    IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name)) AS warn
    where IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min and :date_range.max
),
failed_checks AS (
  SELECT
    to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) as data_date_col,
    err.name AS check_name,
    'Error' AS check_status
  FROM
    IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name)) AS err
  WHERE IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min and :date_range.max
),
warned_checks AS (
  SELECT
    to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) as data_date_col,
    warn.name AS check_name,
    'Warn' AS check_status
  FROM
    IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name))  
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name)) AS warn
  WHERE IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min and :date_range.max
),
passed_checks AS (
  SELECT
    d.data_date_col,
    c.check_name,
    'Pass' AS check_status
  FROM
    all_dates d CROSS JOIN all_checks c
  WHERE
    NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT
        1
      FROM
        failed_checks f
      WHERE
        f.data_date_col = d.data_date_col
        AND f.check_name = c.check_name
    )
    AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT
        1
      FROM
        warned_checks w
      WHERE
        w.data_date_col = d.data_date_col
        AND w.check_name = c.check_name
    )
)
SELECT 
  data_date_col,
  check_name,
  check_status
FROM
  failed_checks
UNION ALL
SELECT
  data_date_col,
  check_name,
  check_status
FROM
  warned_checks
UNION ALL
SELECT
  data_date_col,
  check_name,
  check_status
FROM
  passed_checks
ORDER BY
  data_date_col,
  check_name,
  check_status;

datasets.name: e4f84c04
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
SELECT
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) as data_date_col,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name) IS NOT NULL THEN size(IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name))
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS total_errors,
    SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name) IS NOT NULL THEN size(IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name))
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS total_warnings
FROM
  IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
WHERE
  IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
GROUP BY
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name))
ORDER BY
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name));

datasets.name: 4b9c0643
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
SELECT
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) as data_date_col,,
  err.name AS check_name,
  'error' AS check_status,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM
  IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
  LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name)) AS err
WHERE
  IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
GROUP BY
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)),
  err.name
UNION ALL
SELECT
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) as data_date_col,
  warn.name AS check_status,
  'warning' AS check_type,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM
  IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
  LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name)) AS warn
WHERE
  IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL and to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
GROUP BY
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)),
  warn.name
ORDER BY
  to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)),
  check_name,
  check_status;

datasets.name: dd89cac0

FROM   system.information_schema.columns

datasets.name: eb82a16b
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    source_table_full_name,
    target_table_full_name
  FROM system.access.table_lineage
  WHERE
    -- only rows where this table appears
    (
      source_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
      OR target_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
    )
    -- and exclude rows where source and target are both this table
    AND NOT (
      source_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
      AND target_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
    )
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN target_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
      THEN 'UPSTREAM'
    WHEN source_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
      THEN 'DOWNSTREAM'
  END AS relation,
  CASE
    WHEN target_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
      THEN source_table_full_name           -- tables feeding into given table
    WHEN source_table_full_name = CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)
      THEN target_table_full_name           -- tables fed by given table
  END AS `table name` 
FROM base
GROUP BY relation, `table name`
ORDER BY relation, `table name`;

datasets.name: 2e7360e3
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
/* --title 'Error and Warning Types Breakdown' */
WITH error_types AS (
    SELECT
        'Error' AS category,
        error_struct.name AS type,
        COUNT(*) AS count
    FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name)) exploded_errors AS error_struct
    WHERE (:error_col_name) IS NOT NULL 
    GROUP BY error_struct.name
),
warning_types AS (
    SELECT
        'Warning' AS category,
        warning_struct.name AS type,
        COUNT(*) AS count
    FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) 
    LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name)) exploded_warnings AS warning_struct
    WHERE (:warn_col_name) IS NOT NULL 
    GROUP BY warning_struct.name
),
combined AS (
    SELECT * FROM error_types
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM warning_types
),
total AS (
    SELECT SUM(count) AS total_count FROM combined
)
SELECT
    category,
    type,
    count,
    ROUND((count * 100.0) / total.total_count, 2) AS percentage
FROM combined, total
ORDER BY category, count DESC;

datasets.name: 130fe4d7
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH total_rows AS (
  SELECT
    -- table rows in range
    COUNT(*) +
    -- plus quarantine rows in range (unless same as table_name)
    CASE WHEN (CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)) = (CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) THEN 0 ELSE (
      SELECT COUNT(*)
      FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) s2
    ) END AS total_cnt
  FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)) s1
),
err_warn AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name)   IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS err_cnt,
    SUM(CASE WHEN IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS warn_cnt
  FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) q
)
SELECT
  err_cnt,
  warn_cnt,
  total_cnt
FROM err_warn
CROSS JOIN total_rows;

datasets.name: 36ebb0b2
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH total_rows AS (
  SELECT
    --  table rows in range
    COUNT(*) +
    -- plus quarantine rows in range (unless same as table_name)
    CASE WHEN (CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)) = (CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) THEN 0 ELSE (
      SELECT COUNT(*)
      FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) s2
      WHERE IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL
        AND to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
    ) END AS total_cnt
  FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:v_catalog_name, '.', :v_schema_name, '.', :data_table_name)) s1
  WHERE IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name) IS NOT NULL
    AND to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
),
err_warn AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN IDENTIFIER(:error_col_name) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS err_cnt,
    SUM(CASE WHEN IDENTIFIER(:warn_col_name) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS warn_cnt
  FROM IDENTIFIER(CONCAT(:inv_catalog_name, '.', :inv_schema_name, '.', :q_table_name)) q
  WHERE to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) IS NOT NULL
    AND to_date(IDENTIFIER(:date_col_name)) BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
)
SELECT
  err_cnt,
  warn_cnt,
  total_cnt
FROM err_warn
CROSS JOIN total_rows;

datasets.name: 80c1ba1f
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH metrics AS (
  SELECT
    output_location,
    quarantine_location,
    run_id,
    run_time,
    metric_name,
    CAST(metric_value AS DOUBLE) AS metric_value
  FROM IDENTIFIER(
         CONCAT(:summary_catalog_name, '.', :summary_schema_name, '.', :summary_table_name)
       )
  WHERE metric_name IN ('input_row_count','error_row_count','warning_row_count','valid_row_count')
    AND metric_value IS NOT NULL
    AND output_location IS NOT NULL
    AND run_time IS NOT NULL
    AND run_time BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
),
pivoted AS (
  SELECT
    output_location,
    quarantine_location,
    run_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'input_row_count'   THEN metric_value END) AS input_row_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'error_row_count'   THEN metric_value END) AS error_row_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'warning_row_count' THEN metric_value END) AS warning_row_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'valid_row_count' THEN metric_value END) AS valid_row_count
  FROM metrics
  GROUP BY output_location, quarantine_location, run_id
)
SELECT
  output_location        AS `table name`,
  quarantine_location  AS `quarantine table name`,
  SUM(input_row_count)                                   AS total_input_row_count,
  SUM(COALESCE(error_row_count,   0))                    AS total_error_row_count,
  SUM(COALESCE(warning_row_count, 0))                    AS total_warning_row_count,
  SUM(COALESCE(valid_row_count, 0))                    AS total_valid_row_count,
  100 * try_divide(SUM(COALESCE(error_row_count,   0)), SUM(input_row_count)) AS error_row_pct,
  100 * try_divide(SUM(COALESCE(warning_row_count, 0)), SUM(input_row_count)) AS warning_row_pct,
  100 * try_divide(
        SUM(COALESCE(error_row_count,   0)) + 
        SUM(COALESCE(warning_row_count, 0)),
        SUM(input_row_count)
      ) AS error_warn_pct_sum
FROM pivoted
GROUP BY output_location, quarantine_location
ORDER BY error_warn_pct_sum DESC
LIMIT 5;

datasets.name: 4b270609
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
SELECT
  'ALL_TABLES' AS table_name,
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'valid_row_count'   THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS valid_row_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'warning_row_count' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS warning_row_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'error_row_count'   THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS error_row_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'input_row_count'   THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS input_row_count
FROM IDENTIFIER(
       CONCAT(:summary_catalog_name, '.', :summary_schema_name, '.', :summary_table_name)
     )
WHERE metric_name IN (
        'valid_row_count', 'warning_row_count',
        'error_row_count', 'input_row_count'
      )
  AND run_time IS NOT NULL
  AND run_time BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max;

datasets.name: cca849d2
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
WITH metrics AS (
  SELECT
    output_location,
    run_time,
    run_id,
    metric_name,
    CAST(metric_value AS DOUBLE) AS metric_value
  FROM IDENTIFIER(
         CONCAT(:summary_catalog_name, '.', :summary_schema_name, '.', :summary_table_name)
       )
  WHERE metric_name IN ('input_row_count','error_row_count','warning_row_count','valid_row_count')
    AND metric_value IS NOT NULL
    AND output_location IS NOT NULL
    AND run_time IS NOT NULL
    AND run_time BETWEEN :date_range.min AND :date_range.max
),
pivoted AS (
  SELECT
    output_location,
    run_time,
    run_id,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'input_row_count'   THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS input_row_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'error_row_count'   THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS error_row_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'warning_row_count' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS warning_row_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'valid_row_count'   THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) AS valid_row_count
  FROM metrics
  GROUP BY output_location, run_time, run_id
)
SELECT
  output_location                         AS `Table Name`,
  CAST(run_time AS TIMESTAMP)             AS `Quality Summary TS`,
  SUM(input_row_count)                    AS `Total Rows`,
  SUM(error_row_count)                    AS `Total Errors`,
  SUM(warning_row_count)                  AS `Total Warnings`,
  SUM(valid_row_count)                    AS `Total Valid Rows`,
  100 * try_divide(SUM(error_row_count),   SUM(input_row_count)) AS `Error %`,
  100 * try_divide(SUM(warning_row_count), SUM(input_row_count)) AS `Warn %`,
  100 * try_divide(SUM(valid_row_count),   SUM(input_row_count)) AS `Valid %`
FROM pivoted
GROUP BY output_location, run_time
ORDER BY output_location, run_time;

datasets.name: 1becc3c8
54ca2850
queryLines:
SET use_cached_result = false;
SELECT
  table_name
FROM system.information_schema.tables
WHERE table_catalog = :v_catalog_name
  AND table_schema  = :v_schema_name
ORDER BY table_name;
